attr.title: Operation S.T.E.E.L
attr.desc: A roguelike shmup with hand drawn graphics, procedurally generated levels, enemies, and pickups.
attr.inst: Purchase at itch.io https://leanderish.itch.io/steel -Locate OperationSteel.pck and place it into gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [itch.io](https://leanderish.itch.io/steel) -Locate OperationSteel.pck and place it in to gamedata folder.
